p: Neurologically, SARS-CoV, and COVID-19 cases presented with seizures managed by propofol, phenytoin, and Levetiracetam. Valproate and midazolam also employed in addition to antibiotics hydroxychloroquine or antiviral [16], [51], [52], [53], [54]. Similarly, a five days intravenous immunoglobulin dosage have been employed among COVID-19 GBS patients, but no significant therapeutic benefit in improving GBS symptoms reported [70], [71].
